title: Well Rocked
description: Fame and fortune combine with love and desire in a high stakes game your heart plays.When Becca Hall's new relationship with sexy bass-player Dex manages to survive disasters, both natural and man-made, she thinks this is her chance at real happiness. A good job, a great guy and travel to some of the most beautiful cities in the world. But hopes and dreams are no shield from the ugly realities of life. And just as the connection between them deepens to something quickly approaching love, the couple has to face their most dangerous enemy - the darkness that threatens to consume Dex from within.Winning can make your dreams come true. Losing can destroy everything and leave your world well, and truly rocked.
author: Clara Bayard
